type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Hits on Target

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/hits_on_target).

Checks the amount of times a target has been hit within a time interval.

Type ID: `apugli:hits_on_target`

!!! note
    The interval at which this bi-entity condition's hits reset depends on the Apugli config's resetTimerTicks value.

---

### Example
```json
{
    "bientity_condition": {
        "type": "apugli:hits_on_target",
        "comparison": "==",
        "compare_to": 0
    }
}
```
This example checks if the actor has not hit the target.

comparison.description: How the amount of times the actor has hit the target should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the amount of times the actor has hit the target should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the amount to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the amount to.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Hits on Target (Bi-entity Condition Type) date: 2021-06-20

Hits on Target

Bi-entity Condition Type.

Checks the amount of times a target has been hit within a time interval.

Type ID: apugli:hits_on_target

!!! note The interval at which this bi-entity condition's hits reset depends on the Apugli config's resetTimerTicks value.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
comparison Comparison ">=" How the amount of times the actor has hit the target should be compared to the specified value.
compare_to Integer 1 The value to compare the amount to.

Example

{
    "bientity_condition": {
        "type": "apugli:hits_on_target",
        "comparison": "==",
        "compare_to": 0
    }
}

This example checks if the actor has not hit the target.
